definitions.text: the act of providing approval and support
examples: his vigorous backing of the conservatives got him in trouble with progressives
they have an upper class clientele

definitions.text: a communication that indicates lack of respect by patronizing the recipient
(politics) granting favors or giving contracts or making appointments to office in return for political support
the business given to a commercial establishment by its customers
examples: even before noon there was a considerable patronage

definitions.text: support by being a patron of
be a regular customer or client of
examples: Our sponsor kept our art studio going for as long as he could
